===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{n-g|An unspecified kind of [[ape]]; generally assumed to be [[gibbon]]s or [[orangutan]]s, since they are the only ones geographically possible.}} {{zh-mw|隻}}
#* {{zh-x|猩猩 能 言，不離 禽獸。|Even when an '''orangutan''' speaks, it still is a beast. [i.e. In order to be a civil human, one must do more than talking like one, but must act like one.]|ref=Liji}}
#* {{zh-x|猩猩 者 好{hào}酒 與 屐，人 有 取 之 者，置 二 物 以 誘 之，'''猩猩''' 始 見，必 大 罵 曰：「誘 我 也！」乃 絕走 遠去，久 而 復 來，稍稍 相勸，俄頃 俱 醉，其 足 皆 絆 於 屐，因 遂 獲 之。|The '''''xingxing''''' is a creature fond of alcohol and wooden shoes. Those who wish to capture them would set up these two objects to entice them. When '''''xingxing''''' see them, they would yell out, "You dare trap me?!" They could leave the area but would eventually return. After some encouragement among themselves, they would start drinking and become drunk, starting to put the shoes on, hence getting captured.|CL|ref='''9th cent.''', Li Zhao ([[w:zh:李肇|李肇]]), ''Supplement to the Book of Tang'' (唐國史補)}}
